text: The 1978 Campeonato Nacional was Chilean first tier's 46th season. Palestino was the tournament's champion, winning its second title. ==Standings== ==Results== == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text- align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Oscar Fabbiani||Palestino||35 |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \----- \---- === Liguilla Play-off match === O'Higgins qualified to 1979 Copa Libertadores due to its better League position ==Promotion/relegation Liguilla== * There was no promotion or relegation. == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1978 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1978 Primera División de Chile
